title: Gluten-free hot cross buns
ingredients: ['For the dough', '285ml (9 1/2 fl oz) milk', '50g (2 oz) butter', '500g (17 1/2 oz) gluten-free plain flour', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons maple syrup', '7g (1/4 oz) easy-blend dried yeast', '1 egg, beaten', '1 orange, zested', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '100g (3 1/2 oz) raisins', 'For the decoration', '75g (2 1/2 oz) gluten-free flour', '2 tablespoons maple syrup']
